                    The Albertosaurus Dinosaur 3D Engraved Crystal Keepsake is a stunning piece of art that captures the ferocious presence of one of North America's apex predators, the Albertosaurus sarcophagus. This flesh-eating dinosaur lived millions of years ago in what is now the Canadian province of Alberta, and its fossil remains have been found in the Horseshoe Canyon Formation and along the Red Deer River. With its sharp teeth, large head, and long tail, the Albertosaurus was a formidable predator, comparable to the more well-known Tyrannosaurus rex. Our exclusive one-of-a-kind design by AB Crystal Collection incorporates intricate 3D laser engraving techniques to bring this prehistoric creature to life on a high-quality crystal block. Display it as an illuminated decor in your home or office, and receive a FREE Round LED Base Light (plug-in) to showcase its beauty.
